attributes.action: Give a personal licence to carry any firearm to trained ex-servicemen in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The UK would feel safer knowing that there are trained ex-service personel with firearms in the close vicinity of where the next terrorist acts WILL happen.. taxi drivers.. door staff.. restauranteers.. on the ground to deal with this evil rather than waiting for specialist response when it's far too late.
attributes.background:
The Govt have failed protect our borders, the trojan horse sneeked in the UK!

ISIS threatened it was coming and our govt ignored it. Paris will happen here yet we  cut funding to our police, nhs and fire.

Ex-armed services occupy normal jobs in the most likely places these attacks WILL happen!
